column4: Hey. I tried looking around on the Ubuntu forums but failed to find a definite answer or fix to my problem. I just burned the Ubuntu 11.04 x64 install iso to a CD, but the installation gets stuck at the *Preparing to install* screen. I am using the Live CD function of the CD, so the CD does work, at least to some degree. Any ideas on what could be wrong?
I tried with my flash drive and same thing happened, so I'm just running it inside my windows with virtual drive
this is the first one I'm using. So i'm kinda noob to ubuntu :P
ah, okay. Ive used multiple Ubuntu versions before, and they have all worked
